programme.desc: The team investigates the murder of a petty officer found in a Mardi Gras float storage facility with an engagement ring and proposal plan in hand. However, the case takes a mysterious turn when the team is unable to locate his supposed girlfriend.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: After a stolen navy-issued gun is found to belong to a Chief Petty officer who died 40 years ago, the team reopens the cold case, one that Wade has tracked and investigated for years. programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: The team investigates the murder of a retired SEAL who tracked down individuals impersonating military personnel. But the case takes a mysterious turn when the lead suspect is found with the Navy issued jacket of an officer killed in Afghanistan.

programme.desc: Paige falls victim to a spell that causes her to age; Leslie rigs the dating contest.Guests: Nick Lachey..

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: The Trickster throws Sam and Dean into an alternate universe where they are characters in different television series. The only way out of the world is to play along and become the characters of the shows.

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: Super fan Becky uses Chuck's phone to trick Sam and Dean into attending a Supernatural fan convention, complete with fans dressed as Sam and Dean. Things turn sour when a real ghost appears on the scene.

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: Sam, Dean and Castiel track down the colt and head off to find Lucifer to send him back to Hell. It's a hunters' reunion when the crew joins forces with Bobby, Ellen and Jo for what could be their last night on Earth.

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: Sam and Dean have themselves committed to a hospital when an institutionalized hunter calls and asks for their help investigating attacks on patients at his hospital.

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: A teenager creates a body-switching potion and changes bodies with Sam. Leaving Sam stuck in the body of a geeky teenager and dealing with parents and high school while the teenager works a case with Dean.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: Booth's detective friend, Ken Nakamura, calls him from Tokyo in a panic when his sister Sachi goes missing in Washington. Booth and Brennan are on the case, and their investigation leads them to a grizzly discovery in a canal.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: When a human body is found inside the mascot uniform of a rival school, Brennan and Booth investigate when the death may have occurred. Meanwhile, Booth helps his brother find a job after Jared is dishonourably discharged from the Navy.Guests: Brendan Fehr..

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: When Brenna decides she wants to have a baby, she asks Booth to father the child. The situation stirs up unspoken feelings and unresolved issues between the two, and Booth gets advice from an unlikely source: 'Family Guy's' Stewie Griffin.Guests: Stewie Griffin..

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Leo uses his new powers to reverse time so he can save himself and vanquish the demons.Guests: Patrice Fisher, Joel Swetow, Brad Hawkins, Kevin Alejandro..

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: A navy lieutenant commander in impeccable shape turns to Pride and the team to solve his imminent murder after discovering he has been poisoned with a lethal dose of radiation.Guests: Diane Neal..

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: After an NCIS agent is killed during security detail for the Vice Chief of Naval Operations, the team must determine if this was assassination or if someone is targeting one of their own. Meanwhile, Agent Brody is placed under investigation.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: After a Petty Officer is found murdered in the midst of Mardi Gras events, the team investigates what parades and parties led to his untimely death. Also, Pride must decide what aspects of his strained relationship with his father he is willing to share.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: After a Navy recruiter is the target of a lethal hit and run, the team investigates whether the murder was tied to her career or her role as a foster mother to two brothers. Also, Lasalle grows increasingly concerned for his brother's welfare.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: Pride is adamant the elusive 'Baitfish' has returned and, in an attempt to locate his nemesis, he has the team investigate crime scenes and chase leads from New Orleans to Charleston, South Carolina.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: Everyone is a suspect when a body is found murdered at a popular nightclub known as 'The Lab.' programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: Booth has been recovering from brain surgery while Brennan has been on a dig in Guatemala. During a tarot card reading, Angela's psychic reveals that there are bodies buried under a fountain in Washington, D.C.Guests: Cyndi Lauper..

programme.title: The Legend of Tarzan
programme.desc: Many years after Tarzan left the jungles of Africa to live in London with his wife Jane, he is invited back as a trade emissary to the Congo. He is unaware that he is just a pawn in a deadly convergence of greed, putting both his lives in danger.

programme.desc: Much to Frasier and Niles' disgust, Martin appears on a commercial endorsing a right-wing politician. Frasier decides to help an opponent by agreeing to appear in political ad, until he learns some disturbing information before the shoot.

programme.desc: Frasier heads for a vacation in Bora-Bora with a new flame, but finds an old one instead.
